channel.title: Weird Shit going on..[Help for god sake!]
channel.description:
OKay this another bug i found, or someshit going on with npcs Ok this happens like when your fighting it stops on a hit and u will not be hitting anymore the npc will be freezed and fast unstopped hits on the npc as u can see same number increase, and decrease alone, and it just continue...
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2rp8ieq.jpg[/img]
As for another problem having too having when you login you cant see the screen, you need relog like many times untill u will be able to get it again, And sometimes dc all players and say to all already logged in and sometimes like dc some players, like normal dc's ?!@ WEIRD!!
Help plz.

OKay this another bug i found, or someshit going on with npcs
Ok this happens like when your fighting it stops on a hit and u will not be hitting anymore the npc will be freezed and fast unstopped hits on the npc as u can see same number increase, and decrease alone, and it just continue…
